皳字的基本解释

皳
qiú
古同“毬”，古代的一种皮球，内用毛填充，杖击或足踢，古称“踘丸”、“皮丸”。

皳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
亦作“皳1”。
(1)古代泛称游戏用球类。最初以毛纠结而成，后以皮为之，中实以毛或充以气。
(2)指杂技用球。
(3)谓击球。
(4)泛称球形物。
(5)方言。詈词。原指男性生殖器。
(6)通“裘”。参见“毬馬”。

皳字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皮字部】　皳； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页791第18
【集韻】巨鳩切。同毬。丸鞠也。

皳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
皳字的起名意思

暂无。

皳
Basic explanation of words
皳
qiú
In ancient times, "毬", a kind of leather ball in ancient times, was filled with wool and hit with a rod or kick. In ancient times, it was called "Zhewan" and "Skin Pill".
皳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
Also known as "皳1".
(1) Ancient generally referred to as game balls. At first, it was made of tangled hair, and later it was made of leather. The middle part was made of hair or inflated.
(2) Refers to the acrobatic ball.
(3) Said to hit the ball.
(4) Generally referred to as spherical objects.
(5) Dialects. Slurs. Originally refers to the male genitalia.
(6) Through "Fur". See "Horse".
皳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Pi Word Department] 　皳; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 791 Page 18
[Ji Yun] Giant dove cut. The same. Maruju also.
